price: Akasema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Ninusuru kwa sababu wananikanusha.
footnotes: Huud akasema baada ya kwisha kata tamaa kuamini kwao: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Ninusuru na uwatie adabu, kwa sababu ya kuukadhibisha wito wangu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
